How to Use AI for Marketing: A Practical Guide with Examples

January 15, 2026 • Curated by Chris O'Hara

Copy.ai's practical guide dives deep into the transformative power of AI in marketing, from enhanced personalization to workflow automation. The data is compelling: 61% of marketers say AI is the MVP of their data strategy, and personalized emails powered by AI automation deliver 29% higher unique open rates and 41% higher unique click rates compared to non-personalized emails.

The Evolution of the Modern Marketer

Perhaps most insightful is the article's perspective on how AI is fundamentally shifting the marketer's role from content creator to "insight facilitator." While AI can generate thousands of blog posts in minutes, the true differentiator lies in the quality of conversations and depth of insights that marketers extract from subject matter experts and customers. Modern marketers are becoming strategic curators—focusing on asking better questions, exploring complex topics, and developing narratives that differentiate their brand.

For product marketers specifically, the guide highlights how AI enables sophisticated workflow automation beyond basic tasks, creating end-to-end systems that can operate autonomously while learning and improving over time. The Spotify case study is particularly compelling: their AI analyzes listening habits of millions of users to create personalized playlists that keep listeners engaged—a model PMMs can apply to their own personalization strategies.

Source: Copy.ai Blog
